Options.OPTION[AdvancedRoadTools.Advance: Prevent zoned cells from being removed
Options.OPTION_DESCRIPTION[AdvancedRoadT:
Prevent zoned cells from being overriden during preview and set phase of Zone Controller Tool.
Set this to true if you're having problem with losing your zoning configuration when using the tool.
Default: true
Options.OPTION[AdvancedRoadTools.Advance: Prevent occupied cells from being removed
Options.OPTION_DESCRIPTION[AdvancedRoadT:
Prevent occupied cells from being overriden during preview and set phase of Zone Controller Tool.
Set this to true if you're having problem with buildings becoming vacant and/or abandoned when using the tool.
Default: true
